videoFileToPlay.name: Video to play
videoFileToPlay.hint: Select the video to play. Leave empty to disable

loopVideo.name: Loop the video
loopVideo.hint: How many times the video will loop. -1 to loop forever

removeAfterTime.name: Remove the video after X seconds
removeAfterTime.hint: Remove the video after X seconds. -1 to not remove the video. 0 to remove the video after it concludes. X to remove the video after X seconds. If the video is looping forever 0 and -1 would cause that the video never removes automatically.

removeAfterClick.name: Remove the video on click
removeAfterClick.hint: Remove the video when the user clicks on it

videoOpacity.name: Video opacity
videoOpacity.hint: Change the opacity for the video

coverColor.name: Cover color
coverColor.hint: Change the color for the cover background

coverOpacity.name: Cover opacity
coverOpacity.hint: Change the opacity for the cover

forceScreenRatio.name: Force
forceScreenRatio.hint: Remove the Next Up text whe the player clicks it

forceVideoWidth.name: Hide 'Next Up' notification on click
forceVideoWidth.hint: Remove the Next Up text whe the player clicks it

forceVideoHeight.name: Hide 'Next Up' notification on click
forceVideoHeight.hint: Remove the Next Up text whe the player clicks it

timerColor.name: Color of the timer
timerColor.hint: Select the color of the timer
